divs: Sighting Details(10-??-08) so i let my dogs out waiting for them to go. (it was night out)As i was waiting i looked up to see if i could find any stars. Then i notice this bright light coming from above and behind the house and between the trees I notice one really bright white light, sat there swinging, i was in a trance staring at it. then i got out of this trance when my dogs started barking when i looked back up at it, it was gone. To this day i keep my eyes up to see if it comes back.
Summary: swung back and forth like a playground swing
